ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross
ns0:entry.ns0:content: SPIRV-Cross is a practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.

ns0:entry.ns0:content: LYGIA, it's a granular and multi-language (GLSL, HLSL, Metal, WGSL, WEGL and CUDA) shader library designed for performance and flexibility
